column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Pretty big place
column2: doesn't have a city feel to it at all-Got seated right away and were given the menus with lots of options-I wanted French Toast
column3: but I had no idea it had cinnamon on it
column4: I do not like cinnamon on anything so I was bummed about that-Was it bad
column5: no...but it should state that on the menu if it contains cinnamon-
